extendedInfo.description: They are coming!Your four sided foes have gathered their numbers and are ready to crash the party.How long can you survive their merciless attack strikes?As the last surviving triangle, you must shoot wave after wave of incoming squares as they attempt to reinforce their numbers and conquer all four corners of the screen. Don't be tricked by their cute candy looks! These enemies will attempt to destroy you at any cost. Collect power ups to help crush the enemy and to obtain the top score.Features colorful graphics, rad music and fast paced combat!Now, doesn't that sound great? I know, I know... its awesome+1!***Created for the One Game a Month project. Game 1 -> January***Details:File Size - 6.88mbApplication is transferable to external memory cardKeywords: 2d retro shooter shmup gamemaker studio bullet hell classic 1gam onegameamonth
